channel.title: Can any1 help me to hosta server?
channel.description: I get teamviewer , I hope some1 can help me to make the server online and upload the client. Plz help me Tell me ur msn below if u can help me. (I have already fownloaded the client, need some1 to host it) I have tried but fail.

item.title: Can any1 help me to hosta server?
item.dc:creator: @someone2 someone2
item.description:
@someone2 wrote:

[quote=“deathnote777, post:10, topic:379472”]AFter i downloaded the sources and client, i have done 2 steps.

  1. I created an acc in no-ip.com and created a host with ip address : 218.190.160.50
  2. I go to portforward with port no. : 43594 and ip : 192.168.0.102[/quote]
    The point of no-ip is that people don’t see your ip. If you used no-ip it has to be something like something-scape.no-ip.org or something.

Read full topic
item.source: Can any1 help me to hosta server?

item.title: Can any1 help me to hosta server?
item.dc:creator: @someone2 someone2
item.description:
@someone2 wrote:

Well, i don’t think anybody is just gonna do everything for you. But i can give some help here.

If u didn’t do anything yet:

  1. Find a source and download it. You can find one in the downloads section. The best thing is to begin with a 317 server.
  2. Edit things. Look at tutorials and make your server.
  3. Portforward. There are some tutorials outta here on how to do it.
  4. Run server.
  5. Advertise.
  6. ???
  7. Profit.

Read full topic
